text: The Ambedkar National Congress is a National Political Party registered on 04/04/2002 and headquartered at Door No:8-3-323, Ambedkar Bhavan, Ameerpet X Roads, Ameerpet, Hyderabad 500073, Telangana India. The party works for the rights of Backward Cast, Schedule Cast, Schedule Tribes, Dalits , and Minority communities in bringing equality opportunities to every citizen of India. Mr. Mohammed Kazam Ali Khan is the founder and President of the ANC. Category:Political parties in India
title: Ambedkar National Congress
